system.effect:
Trigger - Your Grass-Type Pokémon is hit by a damaging Bug, Fire, Flying, Ice, or Poison attack that deals Super-Effective Damage
Effect: Your Pokémon gains Temporary Hit Points equal to twice your Type-Linked Skill Rank, and gains +1 Combat Stage in the Stat of your choice. If it is Sunny, they may gain +1 Combat Stage in a second, different Stat. You may activate Enduring Bloom only once per Scene per Pokémon.
system.name: Enduring Bloom

ptu.prereqBackup: Foiling Foliage, Type-Linked Skill at Expert
